content.en: Pavement performance analysis: Researchers are using algorithms to analyze and model the behavior of asphalt pavements. These algorithms, such as the displacement discontinuity method and the finite element Incremental algorithm, are being used to simulate crack propagation, analyze structural response, and predict rutting in asphalt pavements. Other algorithms, like the ViscoWave algorithm and the Lucas algorithm, are being used to accurately determine the dynamics and surface viscoelastic response of pavement. These advancements in algorithmic analysis are helping researchers better understand and improve the performance of asphalt pavements.
content.da: Vejbanens ydeevneanalyse: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at analysere og modellere adfærden af asfaltbelægninger. Disse algoritmer, såsom forskydningsdiskontinuitetsmetoden og den endelige elementers inkrementelle algoritme, anvendes til at simulere revnedannelse, analysere strukturel respons og forudsige spordybning i asfaltbelægninger. Andre algoritmer, som ViscoWave algoritmen og Lucas algoritmen, bruges til præcist at bestemme dynamikken og overfladens viskoelastiske respons af vejbanen. Disse fremskridt i algoritmisk analyse hjælper forskere med bedre at forstå og forbedre asfaltbelægningers ydeevne.
